Dgame.Graphics.Interface.Transformable



abstract interface Transformable;
An Interface for all transformable objects.

Author:
rschuett

void rotate(T)(short, T, T);
Stores the rotation data for the current shape. The second parameter is the center point of rotation.

void rotate(T)(short, ref const Vector2!(T));
Stores the rotation data for the current shape. The second parameter is the center point of rotation.

abstract const ref const(Vector2f) getRotation();
Returns the center point if rotation.

void scale(T)(T, T);
Stores the scale data of this shape.

void scale(T)(ref const Vector2!(T));
Stores the scale data of this shape.

abstract const ref const(Vector2f) getScale();
Returns the scale data.

abstract const pure nothrow @property float scaleX();
Returns only the X component of the scale vector

abstract const pure nothrow @property float scaleY();
Returns only the Y component of the scale vector

abstract @property void scaleX(float x);
Set only the X component of the scale vector

abstract @property void scaleY(float y);
Set only the Y component of the scale vector

abstract const pure nothrow @property float rotX();
Returns only the X component of the rotation vector

abstract const pure nothrow @property float rotY();
Returns only the Y component of the rotation vector

abstract @property void rotX(float x);
Set only the X component of the rotation vector

abstract @property void rotY(float y);
Set only the Y component of the rotation vector
